\w So|strong="H7971"\w* \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* \w blessed|strong="H1288"\w* \w them|strong="H7971"\w* \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w them|strong="H7971"\w* \w on|strong="H7971"\w* \w their|strong="H7971"\w* \w way|strong="H3212"\w*, \w and|strong="H7971"\w* they \w went|strong="H3212"\w* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w their|strong="H7971"\w* homes.

(\w To|strong="H7971"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w half-tribe|strong="H2677"\w* \w of|strong="H7626"\w* \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w had|strong="H4872"\w* \w given|strong="H5414"\w* \w land|strong="H5676"\w* \w in|strong="H5414"\w* \w Bashan|strong="H1316"\w*, \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w to|strong="H7971"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w other|strong="H5676"\w* \w half|strong="H2677"\w* \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* \w land|strong="H5676"\w* \w on|strong="H7971"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w west|strong="H3220"\w* \w side|strong="H5676"\w* \w of|strong="H7626"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w* \w among|strong="H5973"\w* \w their|strong="H5414"\w* brothers.) \w When|strong="H3588"\w* \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H7971"\w* \w their|strong="H5414"\w* homes \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w blessed|strong="H1288"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w*,

saying, “\w Return|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w your|strong="H7725"\w* homes \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w your|strong="H7725"\w* \w great|strong="H7227"\w* \w wealth|strong="H5233"\w*, \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w immense|strong="H3966"\w* \w herds|strong="H4735"\w* \w of|strong="H4735"\w* \w livestock|strong="H4735"\w*, \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*, \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*, \w bronze|strong="H5178"\w*, \w iron|strong="H1270"\w*, \w and|strong="H3701"\w* \w very|strong="H3966"\w* \w many|strong="H7227"\w* \w clothes|strong="H8008"\w*. \w Divide|strong="H2505"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w your|strong="H7725"\w* brothers \w the|strong="H7725"\w* \w spoil|strong="H7998"\w* \w of|strong="H4735"\w* \w your|strong="H7725"\w* enemies.” The Altar of Witness

\w So|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* Reubenites, \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Gadites|strong="H1410"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w half-tribe|strong="H2677"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w* \w left|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w* \w at|strong="H5921"\w* \w Shiloh|strong="H7887"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* land \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Canaan|strong="H3667"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w return|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w own|strong="H3027"\w* land \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Gilead|strong="H1568"\w*, \w which|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* acquired \w according|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w command|strong="H6310"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w through|strong="H3027"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w when|strong="H1121"\w* \w they|strong="H8033"\w* came \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w Geliloth|strong="H1552"\w* \f + \fr 22:10 \ft Or to the circle of stones or to the region; similarly in verse 11\f* \w near|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* land \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Canaan|strong="H3667"\w*, \w the|strong="H5921"\w* Reubenites, \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Gadites|strong="H1410"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w half-tribe|strong="H2677"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w* \w built|strong="H1129"\w* \w an|strong="H1129"\w* imposing \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H2009"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w* \w received|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* report: “\w Behold|strong="H2009"\w*, \w the|strong="H8085"\w* Reubenites, \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w Gadites|strong="H1410"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w half-tribe|strong="H2677"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w* \w have|strong="H1121"\w* \w built|strong="H1129"\w* \w an|strong="H1129"\w* \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* \w on|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* border \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w land|strong="H5676"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Canaan|strong="H3667"\w*, \w at|strong="H3478"\w* \w Geliloth|strong="H1552"\w* near \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w* \w on|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w Israelite|strong="H3478"\w* \w side|strong="H5676"\w*.”

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w when|strong="H8085"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w this|strong="H8085"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w whole|strong="H3605"\w* \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w assembled|strong="H6950"\w* \w at|strong="H5921"\w* \w Shiloh|strong="H7887"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w go|strong="H5927"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w war|strong="H6635"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w The|strong="H7971"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w Phinehas|strong="H6372"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Eleazar \w the|strong="H7971"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H7971"\w* land \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Gilead|strong="H1568"\w*, \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H7971"\w* Reubenites, \w the|strong="H7971"\w* \w Gadites|strong="H1410"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H7971"\w* \w half-tribe|strong="H2677"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w*.

\w With|strong="H5973"\w* \w him|strong="H5973"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* sent \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* \w chiefs|strong="H7218"\w*—\w one|strong="H3605"\w* \w family|strong="H1004"\w* \w leader|strong="H5387"\w* \w from|strong="H3478"\w* \w each|strong="H3605"\w* \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w each|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w head|strong="H7218"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w family|strong="H1004"\w* \w among|strong="H5973"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w clans|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

\w They|strong="H1696"\w* \w went|strong="H1121"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H1696"\w* Reubenites, \w the|strong="H1696"\w* \w Gadites|strong="H1410"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1696"\w* \w half-tribe|strong="H2677"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w* \w in|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H1696"\w* land \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Gilead|strong="H1568"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w said|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w them|strong="H1121"\w*,

“\w This|strong="H2088"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w what|strong="H4100"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w whole|strong="H3605"\w* \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w says|strong="H3541"\w*: ‘\w What|strong="H4100"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* breach \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w faith|strong="H4603"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w committed|strong="H4603"\w* \w today|strong="H3117"\w* \w against|strong="H4775"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w by|strong="H3117"\w* \w turning|strong="H7725"\w* \w away|strong="H7725"\w* \w from|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w building|strong="H1129"\w* \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w yourselves|strong="H3605"\w* \w an|strong="H1129"\w* \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*, \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w might|strong="H3068"\w* \w rebel|strong="H4775"\w* \w against|strong="H4775"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*?

\w Was|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w sin|strong="H5771"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Peor|strong="H6465"\w* \w enough|strong="H4592"\w* \w for|strong="H5704"\w* \w us|strong="H3117"\w*, \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w which|strong="H3068"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w cleansed|strong="H2891"\w* \w ourselves|strong="H4480"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*? \w It|strong="H1961"\w* \w even|strong="H5704"\w* \w brought|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w plague|strong="H5063"\w* \w upon|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3478"\w* \w now|strong="H1961"\w*, \w would|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w turn|strong="H7725"\w* \w away|strong="H7725"\w* \w from|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*? \w If|strong="H1961"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w rebel|strong="H4775"\w* \w today|strong="H3117"\w* \w against|strong="H4775"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w tomorrow|strong="H4279"\w* \w He|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w angry|strong="H7107"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w whole|strong="H3605"\w* \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

If \w indeed|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H8432"\w* land \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* inheritance \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w unclean|strong="H2931"\w*, \w then|strong="H5674"\w* \w cross|strong="H5674"\w* \w over|strong="H5674"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H8432"\w* land \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H8432"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*’s possession, \w where|strong="H8033"\w* \w the|strong="H8432"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*’s \w tabernacle|strong="H4908"\w* \w stands|strong="H7931"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w take|strong="H5674"\w* possession \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w it|strong="H8432"\w* \w among|strong="H8432"\w* \w us|strong="H8432"\w*. \w But|strong="H1107"\w* \w do|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H5674"\w* \w rebel|strong="H4775"\w* \w against|strong="H4775"\w* \w the|strong="H8432"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w or|strong="H3068"\w* \w against|strong="H4775"\w* \w us|strong="H8432"\w* \w by|strong="H5674"\w* \w building|strong="H1129"\w* \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w yourselves|strong="H8033"\w* \w an|strong="H1129"\w* \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* \w other|strong="H1107"\w* \w than|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H8432"\w* \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H8432"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w Was|strong="H1961"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w Achan|strong="H5912"\w* \f + \fr 22:20 \ft Achan means troubler; also called Achar in 1 Chronicles 2:7.\f* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Zerah|strong="H2226"\w* \w unfaithful|strong="H4603"\w* \w regarding|strong="H5921"\w* \w what|strong="H5921"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w set|strong="H3478"\w* \w apart|strong="H2764"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w destruction|strong="H2764"\w*,\f + \fr 22:20 \ft Forms of the Hebrew cherem refer to the giving over of things or persons to the LORD, either by destroying them or by giving them as an offering.\f* bringing \w wrath|strong="H7110"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w whole|strong="H3605"\w* \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*? \w Yet|strong="H3808"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w only|strong="H3605"\w* \w Achan|strong="H5912"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w perished|strong="H1478"\w* \w because|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w sin|strong="H5771"\w*!’”
